backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend canister entry point with no implemented functionality yet.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented features including routing structure, responsive navbar with Delta logo, branding color scheme with gradient buttons, and footer component with social links.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing routing, layout components, pages, styling configuration, and hooks structure.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles with OKLCH color system defining light and dark mode color variables for the design system including brand colors, borders, and component tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with viewport meta tags, 'Concept Delta' title, and root div mounting point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component configuring TanStack Router with six routes (home, dashboard, admin, about, test/:id, result/:id) wrapped in Layout component.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright, COEPian Initiative branding, YouTube/Telegram social icons, and caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/GradientButton.t: Reusable button component with navy-to-light-blue gradient, hover scale effects, and three size variants (sm, default, lg).
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section component featuring MHT-CET practice test heading, COEPian subtext, and gradient CTA button navigating to dashboard.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing consistent structure with Navbar, main content area with Outlet for route rendering, and Footer.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with Delta logo and brand name, Home/About/Login links for desktop, and collapsible hamburger menu for mobile.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook managing Internet Identity authentication and creating backend actor instances with automatic query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future React Query hooks for backend operations; currently empty with only an export statement.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, defining color schemes including brand navy and light blue colors, plus sidebar and chart color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Placeholder About page component displaying a heading and 'Coming soon' message.
frontend/src/pages/Admin.tsx: Placeholder Admin page component displaying a heading and 'Coming soon' message.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Placeholder Dashboard page component displaying a heading and 'Coming soon' message.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Home page component that renders the HeroSection component.
frontend/src/pages/Result.tsx: Placeholder Result page component that extracts an ID parameter from the route and displays it with a 'Coming soon' message.
frontend/src/pages/Test.tsx: Placeholder Test page component that extracts an ID parameter from the route and displays it with a 'Coming soon' message.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining custom color tokens using OKLCH color space, brand colors (navy/blue), container settings, border radius variables, and animation keyframes for accordion components.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing Concept Delta as an MHT-CET practice test platform with navy/light blue branding, documenting completed features including routing structure, navbar, footer, and hero section implementations.
